FB2L
Super Mario Bros.2 The Lost Levels

Unlimited Lives [Crapulecorp]
0043653A 00000009

0043657E 0000000A
*Code ported from GMO Ntsc Usa Version*

004365CE 0000000A
*Code ported from ZiT Ntsc Jap Version*

*Code ported from GMO Ntsc Usa Version*

A-1 Flag [Crapulecorp]
004365DB 00000001
*Code ported from ZiT Ntsc Jap Version*

Always Have Firepower.(Little And Big Mario Are Switched) [Crapulecorp]
00436536 00000002
*you start each area with little mario and firepower.*
*if you get hit, you grow and still have firepower*
*if you get hit again, you die*
*Code ported from giantpune Ntsc Usa Version*

Combine This With The Always Have Firepower Code Above To Not Die [Crapulecorp]
004361CE 00000000
*These 2 codes together make you revert from small to big to small*
*When you get hit and still retain firepower*
*Code ported from giantpune Ntsc Usa Version*
